statements.quote: In light of the leak of my financial disclosure info which is a felony. I will be contacting [@FBI](https://twitter.com/FBI) and the [@TheJusticeDept](https://twitter.com/TheJusticeDept) [#swamp](https://twitter.com/hashtag/swamp?src=hash) [@Reince45](https://twitter.com/Reince45)

name: leaking a financial disclosure form is a felony
